Thanks for AMC & OLTL mickedee77!

BTW starting next week AMC will be on Mondays & Wednesdays, OLTL on Tuesdays & Thursdays and More AMC/OLTL as a single show on Fridays.  So starting May 20th it will be 2 new episodes of each shows a week plus 1 behind the scene series episode for both shows a week.

Source: theonlinenetworkDOTcom
